isis.stitle: POWER STEERING PUMPS LUK VT73 AND LF93 - MAINTENANCE - OVERLOAD PROTECTION

svcproc.title: OVERLOAD PROTECTION
svcproc.para: An integral flow control relief valve subassembly (when fitted) limits pressure in the system to a prescribed maximum and protects the components from excessive pressure. The setting of the relief valve is preset at the factory and depends on the work requirements of the system. DO NOT try to readjust the relief valve in the field. On power steering units, the pitman arm stops should be installed to limit the number of degrees that the pitman arm can move in either direction. This prevents excessive thrust and cramping of the steering linkage which can cause excessive relief valve operation and overheat the pump. Most steering gears are fitted with end-of-travel poppet relief valves.
